ctx: intros f a b lf M H1 H2 H3.
exceptions.tactic: apply (norm_RInt_le f (fun x => M) a b lf M).
exceptions.exn: In environment V : NormedModule R_AbsRing f : R -> V a, b : R lf : V M : R H1 : a <= b H2 : forall x : R, a <= x <= b -> norm (f x) <= M H3 : is_RInt f a b lf Unable to unify "norm lf <= M" with "norm lf <= (b - a) * M".

ctx: intros f a b lf M H1 H2 H3.
exceptions.exn: In environment V : NormedModule R_AbsRing f : R -> V a, b : R lf : V M : R H1 : a <= b H2 : forall x : R, a <= x <= b -> norm (f x) <= M H3 : is_RInt f a b lf Unable to unify "a <= b" with "norm lf <= (b - a) * M".

ctx: intros f a b lf M H1 H2 H3.
exceptions.exn: In environment V : NormedModule R_AbsRing f : R -> V a, b : R lf : V M : R H1 : a <= b H2 : forall x : R, a <= x <= b -> norm (f x) <= M H3 : is_RInt f a b lf Unable to unify "norm (f ?M2365) < M \\/ norm (f ?M2365) = M" with "norm lf < (b - a) * M \\/ norm lf = (b - a) * M".

ctx: intros f a b lf M H1 H2 H3.
exceptions.exn: In environment V : NormedModule R_AbsRing f : R -> V a, b : R lf : V M : R H1 : a <= b H2 : forall x : R, a <= x <= b -> norm (f x) <= M H3 : is_RInt f a b lf Unable to unify "is_RInt f a b lf" with "norm lf <= (b - a) * M".

original: intros f a b lf M H1 H2 H3. apply (norm_RInt_le f (fun x => M) a b lf M). - apply H1. - apply H2. - apply H3.
